personal_info.name: Soham Kulkarni
personal_info.title: Data Science Student & Mathematics Enthusiast
personal_info.subtitle: 3rd Year BS Data Science | IIT Madras
personal_info.description: Passionate about exploring the intersection of mathematics and data science, with a focus on machine learning, statistical modeling, and algorithmic problem-solving. Currently pursuing my degree at India's premier technical institute.

about.intro: I am a third-year BS Data Science student at the Indian Institute of Technology Madras, where I combine my love for mathematics with cutting-edge data science techniques.
about.passion: My passion lies in uncovering patterns in complex datasets and developing mathematical models that solve real-world problems.
about.goals: I aspire to contribute to the field of artificial intelligence and machine learning, particularly in areas where mathematical rigor meets practical innovation.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Data Science and Applications

projects.title: Mathematical Pattern Recognition
projects.description: Developed an ML model to identify and classify mathematical patterns in geometric sequences using computer vision and deep learning techniques.

projects.title: Statistical Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Built an interactive web dashboard for statistical analysis and data visualization, featuring real-time data processing and mathematical computations.

projects.title: Optimization Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Created an educational tool that visualizes various optimization algorithms used in machine learning, including gradient descent and its variants.

projects.title: Time Series Forecasting Model
projects.description: Implemented advanced time series forecasting models for financial data prediction using ARIMA, LSTM, and ensemble methods.

achievements: Top 5% in Linear Algebra course at IIT Madras
Winner of Inter-Department Mathematical Modeling Competition
Published research paper on 'Applications of Graph Theory in Social Network Analysis'
Active contributor to open-source mathematical libraries
